column4: g'morning, is it possible to change the default email client to Thunderbird in the messaging menu? I've already made the change in 'Preferred Applications' but the messaging menu will only launch Evolution.
No, Thunderbird isn't a part of Gnome so doesn't integrate with the menues
You may google around and end up finding some dirty hack, though
Thanks, guess I'll have to wait for .10...Google wasn't much help...
